column2: "/ci1 2 Ah, look who it is. Care to show me how your skills have improved?"
"/ci2 1 Aye. Your movements were spot-on. Keep up the good work."
"/ci2 1 Aye, very good. You put on quite the display."
"/ci1 3 It seems our quarry has fled."
"/ci1 2 How fortuitous. This'll be a great opportunity for you to show me how you've improved."
"/ci2 1 Aye, excellent work, both of you."
"/ci1 3 It seems you've gotten a bit rusty."
"/ci1 2 The enemy has been restrained. Let's get started."
"/ci2 1 I appreciate your assistance. Ever the reliable companion to have in battle."
"/ci1 3 Oh well. Everyone has times like these. I wouldn't dwell too much on it."
